effects.description: Apply 2 True Damage to any item equipped on target
Target is Withered for 1 round
Apply 1d6 True Damage to any item equipped on target
Target is Cursed and Excruciated(4) for 1 round
Target is Sped Up(3) and Hyper-Accelerated for 1 round
Creates a 2x2 square of difficult icy terrain under creature or 1 square mass of ice with 10 HP in an adjacent square
Target is Rooted for 2 rounds
Apply Slowed(2) for 2 rounds
Damage chains to 1 additional target within 3 squares for half damage
Apply Twitching(2) for 1 round
Apply Weakened(1) to all characteristics for 1 round
Applies Wide Open for 1 round
Apply Burning(1d6)
Create a 1 square fire pool dealing 1d6 damage at target creature's feet that lasts for the encounter
Apply Burning(10) and Panicked for 1 round
Apply Withered as Continuous until target is healed
The next time you use the same ability that triggered this, it costs 1 less AP
Give Haste(1) to an ally within line of sight
Gain 3 AP. Each time this effect is chosen in one round, reduce it by 1 AP.
Target is Silenced for 2 rounds
Deal an additional 1d6 Dark Damage to the target
Target gains Cursed for 1 round
You are Strengthened(2) in the same CHAR you used to make the attack and the target is Weakened(2) in that CHAR for 1 round
Target becomes Rotted until the next time they are healed
Target is knocked prone
Apply Hobbled(3) for 1 round
Target has an object in their hand or on their  person knocked 1d4 squares away
Target is encumbered for 1 round
Heal yourself or an ally that can see you for 1d6
All allies that can see the target are Bolstered(1)
Target is Repelled for 1 round against a target of your choice
Target Blinded for 1 round
Target Taunted to yourself or any allied target for 1 round
Make a dispel check against something cast by the target
Target is Taunted and Enraged for 1 round to yourself, any ally, or any enemy or is Pacified for 1 round
Apply Silenced as Affliction(DC2 RES)
Apply Weakened(2) for FIT, or SPD for 2 rounds
Apply Atrophied for 1 round
Apply Sealed for 1 round
Apply Cursed and Sickened(1) for 2 rounds
Target is Exposed(2) for the next attack
Target is pushed up to FIT/Primary CHAR squares backwards or sideways
Target is Staggered for 1 round
Target is knocked prone with Exposed(1) until they stand up
Attack deals half damage to targets adjacent to their area of effect
Target is pushed back 1d6 squares or knocked prone
Increase the radius of the AoE of the attack by 1 square, you may repeat this choice
Apply Pierce(FIT/Primary CHAR) to this attack
Apply Hobbled(1) for the encounter
Apply a called shot effect of your choice
This attack is now a critical hit
Inflict Bleeding (3) for 3 rounds
You gain Blessed for any additional attacks against this target until the end of your next turn
Inflict Bleeding (4) and Sickened(1) for 3 rounds
Inflict 3 True damage to one natural armor or equipment
Increase the damage of this attack by 1, this effect may be purchased multiple times
